name: HammerTime
short: Talk about time easier across timezones
description: A command for making it easier to talk about times across your members' various timezones. Inspired by the tool of the same name: https://hammertime.cyou/
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores timezone information for the user.
install_msg: Thanks for installing this HammerTime! Check out the `[p]help HammerTime` for more information.
author: chovin (irdumb)
